topic.title: 주말 등산 계획하기
topic.description: 친구와 함께 주말 등산 계획을 세우는 상황에 대한 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 우리 같이 등산 가는 거 어때?
좋은 생각이야! 어디로 가는 게 좋을까?
좋아. 그럼 우리 점심으로 뭘 가져갈까?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What are you doing this weekend?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What are you doing | this weekend?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How about we go hiking together?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How about we go hiking | together?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: That's a great idea! Where should we go?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: That's a great idea! || Where should we go?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I heard Bukhansan is good for beginners.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I heard Bukhansan is good | for beginners.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: So, how do we get there?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: So, | how do we get there?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: It's convenient to go by subway.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: It's convenient | to go by subway.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay. Then what should we bring for lunch?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay. || Then what should we bring for lunch?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'll pack some kimbap and fruits.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'll pack some kimbap | and fruits.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: How about we go hiking together?

I'll pack some kimbap and fruits.

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 좋아. 그럼 우리 점심으로 뭘 가져갈까?
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: Okay. Then what should we bring for lunch?
highlight_sentences.reason: 활동 계획을 세울 때 음식을 제안하는 것은 매우 실용적이고 자주 사용되는 표현입니다.
